reg.acttitle: Hotel Room Tax Act; Provincial Sales Tax Act*
reg.title: Additional Tax Regulation for the City of Burnaby

section.sectiontext: In this regulation, Act means the Hotel Room Tax Act.
May 31, 2009, is the prescribed date after which section 3 of the Act applies in respect of accommodation purchased in the City of Burnaby.

section.marginalnote: Prescribed rate of additional tax payable
section.sectiontext: The additional tax payable under section 3 (1) of the Act is 2% of the purchase price of accommodation purchased in the City of Burnaby.

section.marginalnote: Prescribed purpose for expenditure of additional tax
section.sectiontext: The City of Burnaby may spend the amount paid to it out of the revenue collected from the additional tax for tourism marketing, programs and projects.
This regulation is repealed effective June 1, 2014.

content.regnote: Note: this regulation replaces B.C. Reg. 163/2004.

footnote.footnotetext: See section 45 of the Provincial Sales Tax Transitional Provisions and Amendments Act, 2013, S.B.C. 2013, c. 1
